downloadTitle: MVP Session 5: Make and Apply Formatting Changes in Visio 2010 (working file)
downloadDescription: Practice formatting shapes and text in Microsoft Visio 2010 with this diagram, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions, Video 5.
detailsSection: Practice formatting shapes and text in Visio 2010 with this diagram, created as a companion to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 5. MVP Sessions Video 5 covers several tips and new features in Visio 2010 to help you make professional and visually appealing diagrams. Use this working file to follow along with the video and explore these features, such as working with the text features built in to all shapes and formatting individual shapes within a group.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the working file to your computer and then open it with Visio 2010.
